snippet.title: LOST IN FAILURES TRAILER 02 - "MY NAME IS DAVID"
snippet.description:
This is the second official trailer for Lost In Failures, a survival, adventure and action game set in a vivid and challenging open world. The product will be released on 03/22/2024 for the Steam digital store.

For more information, visit the links below:

OFFICIAL GAME WEBSITE - https://www.lightstationdeveloper.com/lostinfailures
LIGHT STATION DEVELOPER WEBSITE - https://www.lightstationdeveloper.com

Social media:

INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/lightstationdev_/
FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/lightstationdeveloper/
X (TWITTER) - https://twitter.com/lightstationdev

Credits:

INTRO MUSIC - DeVern (https://freesound.org/)
